mapper.insert: insert into product_sku ( id, sku_code, sku_name, product_id, thumb_img, sale_price, market_price, cost_price, stock_num, sku_spec, weight, volume, status, sale_num ) values ( #{id}, #{skuCode}, #{skuName}, #{productId}, #{thumbImg}, #{salePrice}, #{marketPrice}, #{costPrice}, #{stockNum}, #{skuSpec}, #{weight}, #{volume}, #{status}, #{saleNum} )
